introduction: I am thrilled to apply for the Frontend Developer role at Emma. With over four years of experience designing and implementing high-performance web applications using React, Node.js, and TypeScript, I am eager to bring my technical expertise and passion for creating exceptional user experiences to your mission of revolutionizing personal finance.

projects.title: Blockchain-Based Trade Platform
projects.description: Led the development of a paperless trade solution using React.js and Web3 APIs, securing a 20M CNY government grant.

projects.title: Asset-Backed Tokenization Platform
projects.description: Developed a blockchain platform for financial asset digitization, using Vue.js and TypeScript. Integrated blockchain data via Web3.js and built React Native wallets for seamless blockchain interactions.

projects.title: Team Enablement
projects.description: Mentored junior developers, standardized coding practices, and introduced tools that streamlined workflows, reducing project setup time by 50%.

missionStatement: What excites me most about Emma is your commitment to empowering users through innovative financial solutions. Your focus on building a strong tech culture resonates deeply with me, as I thrive in collaborative, high-performance teams. I am particularly drawn to your use of TypeScript, React Native, and cutting-edge tools like Kubernetes and GCP, and I am confident in my ability to contribute to your ambitious roadmap.
closing: Thank you for considering my application. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your team.
